speech.words: Hello.  I have just arrived from another planet.
I am a very small robot.  I am called Lift Number Five
What is the.
Big.
person called?
Oh I am so sorry! My hearing sensors are a bit damaged so you will need to be patient with me
I won't call you |adultname| Let's try again
What is the big person called?
Oh I am so sorry! My hearing sensors are a bit damaged so you will need to be patient with me
I won't call you |childname| Let's try again
What is the small person called?
Hello |adultname|.  Nice to meet you!
Did I get that right?
Hello |childname|.  Nice to meet you!
Did I get that right?
Now, what is the name of the small person?
Great. I think I am quite interesting.
Would you like to find out more about me?
Well, I am having a holiday.  It is the first time I have been to another planet.
I came here because you have things called. Stories. On this planet and something called. Fun.
I have never done that.  I would like to have fun and tell stories.
But my imagination is not very big.  Also my hearing sensors are a bit damaged so I might not always hear you.
If I don’t, just be patient with me and try again.
That’s fine I am actually not very exciting.
But, I am having a holiday.  It is the first time I have been to another planet.
I came here because you have things called stories on this planet and something called fun.
I have never done that.  I would like to have fun and tell stories.
But my imagination is not very big.  Also my hearing sensors are a bit damaged so I might not always hear you.
If I don’t, just be patient with me and try again.
I have found a story in one of your human libraries.
It is called Jack and the beanstalk.  I do not know what Jack is.  Or what a beanstalk is.
I am not sure I will understand it.  Have you heard of it?
Can we read it together?
Thank you. I am having the best holiday!
How shall we do this?
If you think I should read the story, say. You read
But |adultname|, if you would like to read the story, say. Me
Great.  Let's get started!
Once upon a time there was a boy called Jack. He lived with his mother.  They were very poor
All they had was a Cow.  One morning, Jack's mother told Jack to take the cow to the market and sell her
When Jack got to the market, he felt nervous
Oh.  So sorry,  I do not understand farmers market.
Maybe a farmers market has animals from a farm?
I think you can help me here.
In fifteen seconds, please name as many farm animals as you can.  I will then look up their sounds in my holiday book
Great. You have decided to read.
When you are ready, you can start
Oh.  So sorry,  I do not understand farmers market
Maybe a farmers market has animals from a farm?
I think you can help me here.
In fifteen seconds, please name as many farm animals as you can.  I will then look up their sounds in my holiday book
Thank you.  I understand what a farmers market is now.  They are very noisy!
Jack was unable to sell his cow at the market.
He was feeling hungry and wondering what his mum would think
Suddenly Jack met a strange man.
With twinkly eyes.
The man wanted Daisy and says he will give Jack
five magic beans for the cow.
Herm. Magic beans?
I do not know this
Is it good to swap magic beans for a cow?
Thanks you.  I understand now
Tomorrow I will look for some magic beans as I think I would like to take a nice cow home with me.
I hope my lift space is big enough for a cow
Magic beans are good
Please help me understand how to swap magic beans for a cow
I understand
It is not good to swap magic beans for a cow.
I do not want magic beans now
Please never give me any magic beans.  I will not accept magic beans.
Magic beans are bad
But please help me understand how to swap magic beans for a cow
Open your hands to collect five magic beans
Yes.  This is good! Now I count the beans
One bean
Two beans
Oh.  My holiday book does not help me buy anything that costs more than two beans
How many more beans must I give twinkly man?
Affirmative!
That is what my calculator says.  Let's count the rest of the beans.
Three beans
Four beans
Five beans
That is very good. Let's get back to the story!
Negative.  My calculator says |mathsanswer:,| is incorrect
I have given two beans and I must give 5 magic beans
How many beans should I give you?
Jack took the beans and went back home.
When Jack’s mother saw the beans she was very angry.
She threw the beans out of the window.
The next morning, Jack looked out of the window. There was a giant bean stalk.
What is a beanstalk?  I do not understand beanstalk
Maybe you can help
Could you make a beanstalk to show me what it looks like?
Hopefully you have a few things you can use to build one.
What is a beanstalk?  I do not understand beanstalk
Maybe you can help
Could you make a beanstalk to show me what it looks like?
Hopefully you have a few things you can use to build one.
You are very kind. Shout DONE when you are done
Negative.  That is ok. Beanstalk sounds like something very big.
I do not know if a beanstalk is a good thing or a bad thing
Let's see what happens in the story and maybe that will help me understand more about beanstalks
okay.  I think you are probably building your beanstalk.  I am really looking forward to seeing it.
Shout done when you are finished
Oh.  Thank you.  That is great
Now I know exactly what a beanstalk is.  I think I will take one home with me
Tomorrow I will purchase some beans and a cow and a beanstalk from a shop
My lift friends will be very happy with me.
Back to the story
He went outside and started to climb the beanstalk.
He climbed higher and higher.
So high, he climbed up to the sky through the clouds.
Jack saw a beautiful castle.  He went inside.
Jack heard a voice.
Fee, Thigh, Foe, Thumb
He ran into a cupboard
An enormous giant came into the room and sat down.  On the table there was a Hen. And a golden harp.
The giant said. Lay.
And the hen laid an egg
Jack could not believe his eyes.  It was made of gold
The harp was magic too.  And it immediately noticed Jack
Now I think I understand imagination better
This is such an amazing story.  I want to do some more imagination
I am going to imagine I am a harp now
I will talk in this voice
Hello I am a magic harp
You imagine that you are Jack.  And if you don't want me to tell the giant you are here, you must help me write a poem.
Okay.  here we go
Ah, little boy
If you don't want me to tell the giant that you are here.  You must help me write an amazing new poem that I can play later on
Let me start
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
He is playing the harp.  Next to a
What word can I use that rhymes with sat?
CAT you say.  Very good! Let's give it a go
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
He is playing the harp, and stroking his CAT
It sits there quietly on the Giant’s KNEE,
What word rhymes with KNEE that I could use?
A HAT.  That's great.  I like that a lot
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
He's playing a harp in a very fine HAT
The hat is beautiful, everyone can SEE
Stitched in the front is the letter
OK, what letter can I use that rhymes with SEE?
MAT you say.  Very good! Let's try that
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
Playing a harp on a luxurious mat
It's so soft and comfy, he digs in his FEET
The only thing that would make it better would be
I need your help, please give me a word that rhymes with FEET
A creepy BAT you say.  Very good! Let's try it.
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
Playing a harp upside down, like a BAT
His hair is all tangled and his face has gone red
OK, what can I use that rhymes with RED?
RAT you say.  Very good! Although I hate rats.  But lets try it
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
He's playing the harp, unaware that a RAT
Has snuck up behind him and I think he MIGHT
OK I need a word that rhymes with MIGHT.  Can you help?
Nice.  Here is what we have so far
Here is a giant, look where he's sat
He's playing a harp in a very fine HAT
The hat is beautiful, everyone can SEE
Stitched in the front is the letter B
Why the letter B I hear it SAID.
It is very odd, because his name is

The only thing that would make it better would be cake made of MEAT
